name: Chicken Searching For Home
description:
Help chicken🐓 to avoid cars🚗 while crossing the road to find its way to home🗺

Amazing adventure game😍 that will keep you excited till the end🕺.

Help each chicken🐓 to find its way to home🏡 by crossing the road while avoiding cars🚒, collecting keys🗝 and chickens if needed.

The farmer👨‍🌾 has lost his chickens while driving🚘 on the road☹️. So by your help, each chicken will go back to the farm🏡 and the farmer will be happy😄 again.

Remember to finish each level in the minimum possible time⌛️, to take a lead on the leaderboard. We will show the first 14 players with the highest score on the leaderboard🏆🥇.

You can always play the passed levels at any time to beat your previous score and take a better order on the leaderboard😉.

Be careful of the cars...they will make you lose😔!

Take a deep breath and relax while crossing the street, it is not easy but also it is not impossible, show us your talents😉.

How to play🕹:

-----------------------

🍳Dodge the cars.

🍳Collect keys and chickens, if needed, to pass the level.

🍳Finish each level as fast as possible to take the lead on the leaderboard.

Features🎊:

--------------------

🍳Lots of challenging levels😎.

🍳Explore different roads during your journey.

🍳Leaderboard🏆🥇.

🍳Some roads are hard to cross, but not impossible.

🍳No Wi-Fi or internet connection is required.

Are you a mastermind🧠 with enough skills to help chickens to cross the street and get them back to the farmer😱?!

Download the game NOW! Give it your best shot😉!
